# detectDarkOnLight

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the request detects a dark object on a light background.

## Declaration

```swift
var detectDarkOnLight: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Configuring the Request

- **contrastAdjustment**: The amount by which to adjust the image contrast.
- **contrastPivot**: The pixel value to use as a pivot for the contrast.
- **detectsDarkOnLight**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request detects a dark object on a light background to aid in detection.
- **maximumImageDimension**: The maximum image dimension to use for contour detection.
